title: ConeLimit
description: A limit that restricts the orientation of the spring in a cone shape.

angle.description: The angle of the cone limit in radians. If the angle is set to π or greater, the angle will be interpreted as π by the implementation. When the angle is set to π, the cone shape becomes a sphere.

rotation.description: The rotation from the default orientation of the cone limit. The rotation is represented as a quaternion (x, y, z, w), where w is the scalar.
